svg.text: DEMOCRATIZING REAL WORLD ASSET OWNERSHIP THROUGH WEB3
• High entry barriers requiring substantial capital
• Geographic limitations restricting access to prime locations
• Complex legal frameworks that vary by jurisdiction
• Centralized control that excludes community input
• Enables fractional ownership of physical properties
• Provides global access to exclusive and tax-advantageous locations
• Creates transparent governance through DAO structures
• Generates sustainable revenue through strategic asset monetization
• Leverages blockchain’s immutable record-keeping for secure tracking
